tool_description: Predicts the mutational effect score of a given mutation on a wild type sequence.

required_parameters.name: mut_position
required_parameters.description: The position of this mutation. This should be a INT within the range of the sequence length, starting from 0

required_parameters.name: mut_info
required_parameters.description: The mutation information in the format of "A123B", where A is the original amino acid, 123 is the position and B is the mutated amino acid. If multiple mutations are provided, they should be separated by colon, e.g. "A123B:C124D".

return_values.name: effect_score
return_values.description: The predicted mutational effect score of the specific mutant or position
